message: I wanted to add http://www.deloitte.com/assets/Dcom-UnitedStates/Local%20Assets/Documents/TMT_us_tmt/us_tmt_%20Social%20Software%20for%20Business_031011.pdf and somehow cannot save this URL. Then I saved the basic info without the link (http://notedup.com/goetz/notes/75), but still cannot add the link later. Perhaps this is due to the way you handle links/files - the PDF is about 2MB.
hmm...seems to be a problem for all PDF links.  Thanks for catching that.  We'll take a look.
The image extraction function seems not to work on most sites - on amazon.co.uk it seems to be useful, but none of my actual notes got a nice image. That's a bit sad ;)
